title: Script ID : Piutre
content:
At first I thought the logo was custom, but the t-r transition doesn't seem smooth enough. Can anyone identify the typeface? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414164123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/piutrelogo_6625.jpg)
author: seventy7

comments.content: This looks like some mistreated Mistral.
